name: Keep it Cool, Talli!
description:
In Keep it Cool, Talli! you play as Tallizette Redwood. Talli is the leader of the Staroq (Star-oak), and is having to host a tradition of were the other gang leaders and their top men, stay at her casino. Talli wants to make the most of the next two weeks, maybe she'll become good friends with one of her rivals and maybe, become even more.

Development & Updates

KiCT is  mostly being developed by one person with help, here and there for character design. I probably won't have another update until I'm probably finished with the writing part of the demo. If you want to get early access updates join my discord server.

Known Errors

A few of the values may be off causing an error, just rollback the script and pick another character's scene, I'll have the patch posted on my discord server and (of course) in the next big update on here.
